Display: ? - Shows all node commands
BBS - Connect to the local BBS
(B)YE - Disconnect from the current node
CHAT - Connect to the chat room
(C)ONNECT - Connect from this node to another node
(I)NFO - Requests text INFO file from node
(L)INKS - Requests information about current ax.25 sessions
(M)HEARD - Monitor Heard -- Shows how long ago stations were heard by the node on a port
MHL - Monitor Heard List-- Shows what local time stations were heard by the node on a port
(N)ODES - Requests a list of all nodes known by this node
N Nodename - Shows the routes for the specified node
N T - Shows the round trip times and frame counts for all nodes with a non-zero count
PASSWORD - Requests access to password protected commands
(P)ORTS - Requests list of ports (radios) configured for the node
(R)OUTES - Requests list of neighbor nodes for this node
ROUTES PERF - Shows route performance
(S)TATS - Requests file of statistics for this node
(U)SERS -Requests list of stations connected into or through this node's command interpreter
/help - Shows all Chat commands. Commands can be in upper or lower case
/U - Show Users
/N - Enter your Name. Or just /N to see the current name.
/Q - Enter your QTH. Or just /Q to see the current QTH.
/T - Show Topics
/T Name - Join Topic or Create new Topic. Topic Names are not case sensitive
/P - Show Ports and Links
/A - Toggle Alert on user join - Home recommends this be Enabled
/C - Toggle Colour Mode on or off. Home recommends this be Enabled
/E - Toggle Echo - Home recommends this be Enabled
/Keepalive - Toggle sending Keepalive messages every 10 minutes - Enable as necessary.
/ShowNames - Toggle displaying name as well as call on each message - Enable as desired.
/Time - Toggle displaying timestamp on each message - Home recommends this be Disabled
/S CALL Text - Send Text to that station only
/F - Force all links to be made
/K - Show Known nodes
/QUIT - Leave Chat and disconnect from node. Same as Switch toggle.
